transmissions.title: Creating the First Honduran ZEDE: Lessons in Political Economy, Institutional Design, and Governance Systems
transmissions.summary: Peer-reviewed academic paper on the history, formation, and governance structure of Pr√≥spera. Co-authored with Erick Brimen and Nicholas Dranias.

transmissions.title: The Voluntaryist Constitution
transmissions.summary: A theoretical framework for constitutional governance based on voluntary association and consent. Co-authored with Stephan Kinsella, Cesar Balmaseda, and Pierre-Louis Boitel.

transmissions.title: How to Build a Better Tax Haven
transmissions.summary: Analysis of Cayman Enterprise City and the principles of competitive governance. How jurisdictional competition can drive better policy.

transmissions.title: Book Review: Your Next Government? by Tom W. Bell
transmissions.summary: Review of Tom W. Bell's book on the transition from nation states to stateless nations and special jurisdictions.

transmissions.title: Prosperity Districts and Mississippi Economic Development
transmissions.summary: Chapter 10 in the Mississippi Center for Public Policy book. Analysis of how prosperity districts can drive economic development in Mississippi.

transmissions.title: Criminal Justice Reform and its Social and Economic Impact
transmissions.summary: Chapter 16 in the Mississippi Center for Public Policy book. Examining the intersection of criminal justice reform with economic outcomes.

transmissions.title: 14 Outrageously Silly Tennessee Taxes and Laws
transmissions.summary: A look at some of the most absurd taxes and regulations still on the books in Tennessee.

transmissions.title: The Real Consequences of Raising the Minimum Wage
transmissions.summary: Economic analysis of minimum wage policy and its effects on employment and business.
